properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hiki ni chakula cha uzima
(cha uzima)
njooni tupokee. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana ni chakula
kweli cha uzima,
Bwana ni kinywaji kweli.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana ndiye shime
yangu na uzima
kweli ni msaada wangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana ananifundisha
njia zake kweli
ni mwalimu wangu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana ananituliza
siku zote,
yeye ni faraja yangu .

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bwana ananishibisha
siku zote,
yeye ni chakula changu.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Bwana anaburudisha
kweli kweli,
yeye ni kinywaji changu.
